name: construction of multi-tenant database
short_description:
Many companies want to outsource their data to a third party that host a database called multitenant database. Multitenant database requires
high performance, low space requirement and excellent scalability. To achieve
this parameters there are two approaches namely Independent Tables Shared Instances (ITSI) and Shared Tables Shared Instances(STSI). Since multitenant database need to maintain large number of tables the ITSI approach gives poor scalability
but STSI approach gives good scalability and poor performance with high space overhead. The adaptive database schema design is proposed for multitenant
database which trade off the ITSI and STSI and find balance between them to improve the good scalability and high performance with low space requirement. This schema design maintain two types of table namely base table and supplementary
table.
summary: To improve scalability and performance of database
